original_text: And when the messengers came in, behold, the image was in the bed, with the pillow of goats' hair at its head.
korean_text: 전령들이 들어가 본즉 침상에는 우상이 있고 염소 털로 엮은 것이 그 머리에 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And when the messengers came in,
the image was in the bed,
with the pillow of goats' hair at its head.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 머리맡에 염소 털 베개가 있었다.
